name: Big Ichigeki! Pachi-Slot Dai-Kouryaku
overview: One more pachi-slot game with the usual selection of pachi-slot machines to choose from and then attempt to win the jackpot. The idea is to play the machines enough times to get a sense of how its payouts work and then take that knowledge to real-life pachi-slot parlors. It was followed by Big Ichigeki! Pachi-Slot Daikouryaku 2: Universal Collection in 1995.
